page.title: 16NEASHAM FARMS
page.content:
Neasham Hill farm ,150 acres. Farmed by one family with one farmhouse on the land. Crops are Barley, Potatoes and Turnips and grazing land. Sheep and beasts are also fattened.
Cold Comfort Farm Neasham, 200 acres. Farmed by one family with one farmhouse on the land. Crops are: Wheat 70 acres Barley 20 acres Rape 20 acres Grass 80 acres Beasts are also fattened.
Low Maidendale Farm is farmed by one family. There is one farmhouse on the land. Main crops are Wheat, Barley, Rape and Grass.Maidendale Plantation has been turned into agricultural land.Low Neasham Springs is occupied as a house and the land is grassed.
